ygData.subject: Re: Warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: FYI:  I sent a letter to Brad this morning with the results of the petition. Overall there were over 1600 votes.  Roughly 1400 For and 200 Against.  Even if
ygData.messageBody:
FYI: I sent a letter to Brad this morning with the results of the petition.
Overall there were over 1600 votes. Roughly 1400 For and 200 Against. Even
if Verant doesn't like the petition. I think there is plenty in the
comments for them to see what people are wanting or not wanting.

There were a lot of monks complaining that if this was done warriors would
be better than them and wah, wah, wah. Anyway, hope everything turns out
well.

Trent Carroll
Programmer
Houston Baptist University
(281) 649-3410

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Patricia Halas [mailto:patty_halas@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 28, 1999 10:31 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Warriors
>
>
> From: Patricia Halas <patty_halas@...>
>
> >If they actually did that to the warrior class, let them advance
> 6 a >lvl,
> >there would be no stopping them. Some of you may not want to >see this,
> >but at gameznet.com/eq there is a new post about the >success at duel
> >wielding and double attack. With all these updates >you guys
> would nonstop
> >4 hit attack. Now, I see how as of right now >the warrior are worse than
> >the SKs, pallys, and rangers. But if you >do much to the
> warriors you guys
> >will be able to blow us away. I'm >a troll SK and my guys is mainly a
> >warrior with a few spells. If you
> >do all these things you people have listed to the warrior class then
> > >warriors will be a super class, be reasonable. Ask for some small
> > >changes. Not letting their skills increase at 6 a lvl and go
> up to >300
> >AND ask for weapon specialization. A warrior would outdamage a
> >gd WIZARD!
> > You people are crazy if you except them to make that >kind of change.
>
> hehehehehehehe
>
> Hummm let's see. If I hit 4 times in one round for, oh let's go
> for broke,
> say 25 points each [some super magic 1H sword from h*#l] = 100 points.
> Wizard with comet spell, one turn = 1500 points.
>
> Geez, all we are asking for is wpn specialization and skill cap
> at 250 or so
> like the other classes already have in their unique skills.
>
> Patricia of Halas
>
> note: Verant has already made many changes early on in other classes. Us
> warriors only waited until now to ask for a couple of small additions.
> Warriors will always have to group at higher levels, tis the
> nature of being
> a tank.
>
>
